sources.title: Federal Operator 99 (1945) colorized cliffhanger serial
sources.description: The FBI's daring and resourceful Operator 99 (Martin Lamont) goes into action, assisted by his gal Friday (Helen Talbot), when a criminal mastermind (George J. Lewis) escapes custody and along with his lieutenants (Lorna Gray and Hal Taliaferro) embarks on a series of daring thefts involving lots of chases and stunts with cars, motorcycles and airplanes. A 12-chapter cliffhanger serial. I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.

metadata.Plot: Crime lord Jim Belmont escapes FBI custody and begins a reign of thievery that is thwarted at every turn by Jerry Blake, the FBI's Operator 99.
metadata.Director: Spencer Gordon Bennet, Yakima Canutt, Wallace Grissell
metadata.Writer: Albert DeMond, Basil Dickey, Jesse Duffy
metadata.Actors: Marten Lamont, Helen Talbot, George J. Lewis
